verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I <S%H6960>waited<s%> <S%H6960>patiently<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and he <S%H5186>inclined<s%> to me, and <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H7775>cry.<s%>

He <S%H5927>brought<s%> me up also out of an <S%H7588>horrible<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> out of the <S%H3121>miry<s%> <S%H2916>clay,<s%> and <S%H6965>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> on a <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H3559>established<s%> my <S%H838>goings.<s%>

And he has <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> even <S%H8416>praise<s%> to our <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is that <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H4009>trust,<s%> and <S%H6437>respects<s%> not the <S%H7295>proud,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> such as <S%H7750>turn<s%> <S%H7847>aside<s%> to <S%H3576>lies.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> are your <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works which you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> and your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> which are to <S%H413>us-ward:<s%> they <S%H408>cannot<s%> be reckoned up in <S%H6186>order<s%> to you: if I would <S%H5046>declare<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> of them, they are <S%H6105>more<s%> than can be <S%H5608>numbered.<s%>

<S%H2077>Sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>offering<s%> you did not <S%H2654>desire;<s%> my <S%H241>ears<s%> have you <S%H3738>opened:<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering and <S%H2401>sin<s%> offering have you not <S%H7592>required.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H2009>See,<s%> I <S%H935>come:<s%> in the <S%H4039>volume<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> it is <S%H3789>written<s%> of me,
I <S%H2654>delight<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H7522>will,<s%> O my <S%H430>God:<s%> yes, your <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H4578>heart.<s%>

I have <S%H1319>preached<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation:<s%> <S%H2009>see,<s%> I have not <S%H3607>refrained<s%> my <S%H8193>lips,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H3045>know.<s%>

I have not <S%H3680>hid<s%> your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> I have <S%H559>declared<s%> your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and your <S%H8668>salvation:<s%> I have not <S%H3582>concealed<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> from the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

<S%H3607>Withhold<s%> not you your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> from me, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> let your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me.

For <S%H369>innumerable<s%> <S%H4557><s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> have <S%H661>compassed<s%> me about: my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H5381>taken<s%> <S%H5381>hold<s%> on me, so that I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H7200>look<s%> up; they are <S%H6105>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head:<s%> therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5800>fails<s%> me.
Be <S%H7521>pleased,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me: O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me.

Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> it; let them be <S%H5472>driven<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%> and put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> that <S%H2655>wish<s%> me <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
Let them be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> for a <S%H6118>reward<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H253>Aha,<s%> <S%H253>aha.<s%>

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> you <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be glad in you: let such as <S%H157>love<s%> your <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified.<s%>

But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy;<s%> yet the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H2803>thinks<s%> on me: you are my <S%H5833>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> make <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H309>tarrying,<s%> O my <S%H430>God.<s%>
